languages.text: "Вольный Торговец сказал{mf||а} свое слово — баржи отправятся куда следует, а в страже Летуса больше нет нужды. Я... Я надеялся почувствовать облегчение. Я знаю, что оно там, заперто в моих протоколах. И она... Она хотела, чтобы я знал, но не почувствовал..." {n}Страж роняет голову на впалую грудь. Даже в момент смерти он не испытал блаженства свободы.{/n}

"The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец сказал{mf||а} свое слово — баржи отправятся куда следует, а в страже Летуса больше нет нужды. Я... Я надеялся почувствовать облегчение. Я знаю, что оно там, заперто в моих протоколах. И она... Она хотела, чтобы я знал, но не почувствовал..." {n}Страж роняет голову на впалую грудь. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha hablado: las naves viajarán al destino que ha decretado y el vigilante de Leethus ha cumplido su propósito. Yo... esperaba que esto fuera un alivio. Sé que está ahí, enterrado en protocolos. Y ella... quería que supiera, no que sintiera...». {n}La cabeza del vigilante cae contra su pecho hundido. Ni siquiera en el momento de su muerte pudo disfrutar la alegría de la libertad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha hablado: las naves viajarán al destino que ha decretado y el vigilante de Leethus ha cumplido su propósito. Yo... esperaba que esto fuera un alivio. Sé que está ahí, enterrado en protocolos. Y ella... quería que supiera, no que sintiera...». {n}La cabeza del vigilante cae contra su pecho hundido. Ni siquiera en el momento de su muerte pudo disfrutar la alegría de la libertad.{/n}

languages.text: “行商浪人已经做出了决定，驳船即将向{mf|他|她}命令的目标进发，利瑟斯的守望者也已经完成了存在的意义。我……我本以为会感到解脱。我知道这一切就在那里，封锁在我的协议之中。而她……她想让我知晓真相，而又被剥夺感觉……”{n}看守者垂下了头，耷拉在他干瘪的胸膛前。即便是临死的这一刻，他也依然未能体会到自由的喜悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人已经做出了决定，驳船即将向{mf|他|她}命令的目标进发，利瑟斯的守望者也已经完成了存在的意义。我……我本以为会感到解脱。我知道这一切就在那里，封锁在我的协议之中。而她……她想让我知晓真相，而又被剥夺感觉……”{n}看守者垂下了头，耷拉在他干瘪的胸膛前。即便是临死的这一刻，他也依然未能体会到自由的喜悦。{/n}

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーが言った。荷船は{mf|彼|彼女}が命じる場所へ行き、リーザスの監視者が彼の目的を果たしている。私は…安心を得ることを望んでいたのだろう。それが私のプロトコルに閉じ込められていることはわかっている。そして彼女は…私に知ってほしかった…感じないでほしかった…」{n}監視者の頭が彼の落ちくぼんだ胸にぶつかる。死に際でさえ、彼は自由の高揚を否定した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーが言った。荷船は{mf|彼|彼女}が命じる場所へ行き、リーザスの監視者が彼の目的を果たしている。私は…安心を得ることを望んでいたのだろう。それが私のプロトコルに閉じ込められていることはわかっている。そして彼女は…私に知ってほしかった…感じないでほしかった…」{n}監視者の頭が彼の落ちくぼんだ胸にぶつかる。死に際でさえ、彼は自由の高揚を否定した。{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat gesprochen: Die Lastschiffe werden {mf|seinem|ihrem} Erlass folgen, und der Wächter von Leethus hat seinen Zweck erfüllt. Ich ... Ich hatte gehofft, das wäre eine Erleichterung. Ich weiß, sie ist da, irgendwo in meinen Protokollen. Und sie ... wollte, dass ich weiß, nicht fühle ..." {n}Der Kopf des Wächters sinkt auf seine eingefallene Brust. Selbst im Augenblick seines Todes blieb ihm das Hochgefühl der Freiheit verwehrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat gesprochen: Die Lastschiffe werden {mf|seinem|ihrem} Erlass folgen, und der Wächter von Leethus hat seinen Zweck erfüllt. Ich ... Ich hatte gehofft, das wäre eine Erleichterung. Ich weiß, sie ist da, irgendwo in meinen Protokollen. Und sie ... wollte, dass ich weiß, nicht fühle ..." {n}Der Kopf des Wächters sinkt auf seine eingefallene Brust. Selbst im Augenblick seines Todes blieb ihm das Hochgefühl der Freiheit verwehrt.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a parlé : les barges iront là où {mf|il|elle} l'a décidé, et la mission du gardien de Leethus est à présent terminée. Je... j'avais espéré éprouver comme une sorte de délivrance. Je sais que le sentiment du devoir accompli est là, caché quelque part dans mes circuits, et... c'est précisément ce qu'elle voulait. Que j'en aie conscience, mais qu'il me reste inaccessible. » {n}La tête du gardien s'affaisse sur sa poitrine creusée. Jusqu'à son dernier souffle, il aura été privé de l'ivresse de la liberté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a parlé : les barges iront là où {mf|il|elle} l'a décidé, et la mission du gardien de Leethus est à présent terminée. Je... j'avais espéré éprouver comme une sorte de délivrance. Je sais que le sentiment du devoir accompli est là, caché quelque part dans mes circuits, et... c'est précisément ce qu'elle voulait. Que j'en aie conscience, mais qu'il me reste inaccessible. » {n}La tête du gardien s'affaisse sur sa poitrine creusée. Jusqu'à son dernier souffle, il aura été privé de l'ivresse de la liberté.{/n}

languages.text: "Hür Tacir kararını verdi. Mavnalar, o nereye istediyse oraya gidecek. Leethus Gözcüsü amacına hizmet etti. Ben... Rahatlayacağımı umardım. Bu hissin protokollerimde yattığını biliyorum. Tabii o... Bunu bilmemi ve hissetmemi isteme..." {n}Gözcü'nün başı, çökmüş göğsüne değiyor. Ölüm anında bile özgürlüğün verdiği hazzı tadamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has spoken: the barges will go where {mf|he|she} has decreed, and the watcher of Leethus has served his purpose. I... I had hoped that I would feel relief. I know that it's there, locked inside my protocols. And she... she wanted me to know and to not feel..." {n}The watcher's head hits his sunken chest. Even at the moment of his death, he was denied the elation of freedom.{/n}

Bu hissin protokollerimde yattığını biliyorum. Tabii o... Bunu bilmemi ve hissetmemi isteme.." {n}Gözcü'nün başı, çökmüş göğsüne değiyor. Ölüm anında bile özgürlüğün verdiği hazzı tadamıyor.{/n}
